disableStrategy(address,address).details: Disables a voting strategy on the module

params.prevStrategy: Strategy that pointed to the strategy to be removed in the linked list

enableStrategy(address).details: Enables a voting strategy that can vote on proposals

params.strategy: Address of the strategy to be enabled

executeProposalBatch(uint256,address[],u.details: Executes batches of transactions inside of a proposal.

params.data: the data to be executed from the calls
params.targets: the contracts to be called by the avatar
params.values: ether values to pass with the calls

executeProposalByIndex(uint256,address,u.details: Executes a transaction inside of a proposal.

params.data: the data to be executed from the call
params.target: the contract to be called by the avatar
params.value: ether value to pass with the call

generateTransactionHashData(address,uint.details: Generates the data for the module transaction hash (required for signing)

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to get the tx hashes for

returns._0: bytes32[] The array of tx hashes

params.pageSize: Maximum number of strategy that should be returned.

getTxHash(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the hash of a transaction in a proposal.

isStrategyEnabled(address).details: Returns if a strategy is enabled

returns._0: True if the strategy is enabled

isTxExecuted(uint256,uint256).details: Returns true if a proposal transaction by index is exectuted.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

receiveStrategy(uint256,uint256).details: Signals a successful proposal, timelock is optional

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAvatar(address).details: Sets the avatar to a new avatar (`newAvatar`).

setGuard(address).details: Set a guard that checks transactions before execution.

params._guard: The address of the guard to be used or the 0 address to disable the guard.

setTarget(address).details: Sets the target to a new target (`newTarget`).

state(uint256).details: Get the state of a proposal

returns._0: ProposalState the enum of the state of the proposal

params.data: any extra data to pass to the strategy
params.strategy: the voting strategy to be used with this proposal
params.txHashes: an array of hashed transaction data to execute

submitProposalWithMetaData(address,bytes.details: This method is used instead of Usul.submitProposal. Essentially - it just implements same behavior but then - it also emits metadata of the proposal in ProposalMetadataCreated event.

params.data: - any additional data, which would be passed into IStrategy.receiveProposal
params.documentationUrl: - proposal documentation/discussion URL, emitted in ProposalMetadataCreated.  Supposed to be link to Discord/Slack/Whatever chat discussion
params.strategy: Address of Voting Strategy, under which proposal submitted
params.title: - proposal title, emitted in ProposalMetadataCreated

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

disableStrategy(address,address).notice: This can only be called by the owner

enableStrategy(address).notice: This can only be called by the owner

executeProposalBatch(uint256,address[],u.notice: Transactions must be called in ascending index order

executeProposalByIndex(uint256,address,u.notice: Transactions must be called in ascending index order

getProposalTxHashes(uint256).notice: Gets the transaction hashes associated with a given proposald

setAvatar(address).notice: Can only be called by the current owner.

setTarget(address).notice: Can only be called by the current owner.
